solution_line_template: Jack earned from the brownies ${brownie_price} per brownie * {brownies_sold} brownies = $<<{brownie_price}*{brownies_sold}={brownie_earnings}>>{brownie_earnings}.
Jack earned from the lemon squares ${lemon_square_price} per square * {lemon_squares_sold} squares = $<<{lemon_square_price}*{lemon_squares_sold}={lemon_square_earnings}>>{lemon_square_earnings}.
He sells cookies for ${cookie_price} each, so Jack still needs to sell ${remaining_needed} / ${cookie_price} = <<{remaining_needed}/{cookie_price}={cookies_needed}>>{cookies_needed} cookies.
